title: HopeFear Title Graphic
content:
This will be produced about 2-3 feet tall, out of cut vinyl, put up on a wall above some infographics. Thoughts?

[CLICK THIS TO SEE IT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418220858/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/evanmade/3935831050/sizes/o/)
author: evanmacdonald

comments.content:
This will look neat once it is produced and displayed. What kind of info graphics will it be presented with?

Some terms/wording are defintiely stronger in the heirarchy (I see Spiders and Dying Alone first). No words in the HOPE portion stand out as strongly as those 2 do in FEAR.

Also curious about what influenced your color choice.  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
